sentinel.led
Class LEDInterface

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sentinel.led.LEDInterface
public class LEDInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements SentinelComm, java.io.Serializable

The LEDInterface class is a communication module in the Local Event Detection (LED).

See Also:

send

public void send(java.lang.String destination,
                 SentinelMessage mesg)
This method is to send the message from the client to server There are two types of messages (DetectionRequest and Notification)
Specified by:
send in interface SentinelComm

receiveEvntDetctnReqst

public void receiveEvntDetctnReqst(SentinelMessage mesg)
This method is called by LEDMesgRecvImp, when it receives detection request from the GED. It unpacks the message to obtain the event name and context in order to set the forward flag.

receiveNotification

public void receiveNotification(SentinelMessage mesg)
This method is called by LEDMesgRecvImp, when it receives notification from the GED. It unpacks the message to obtain the event name and PCTable and create the notifyOject and put it into the notifyBuffer
